name: Dungeon and Puzzles Final Demo
description:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a 2D spatial logic and ability switch puzzle game. Hero's ability is depends on what equipment he currently uses. You have to think through every step. After clearing the level, you can try other routes of strategy to optimize your solution.
《地城謎蹤》是一款2D空間邏輯和能力切換的解謎遊戲，勇者的能力會隨著裝備的切換而有所改變，所以每一步都需要深思熟慮。過關之後，你可以繼續嘗試不同的攻略路線並最佳化解法。

It's a demo version.  Can play about 22-24 levels.
If you are interested, please keep following us and add “Dungeon and Puzzles” to your wishlist!
這是試玩版，有約22-24個關卡可以遊玩。
如果覺得還不錯的話，請將《地城謎蹤》加入願望清單，並持續關注我們哦！

Join the HuMoFish discord server to give feedback and report bugs, get more information about this game and news of new project in the future!
加入 HuMoFish 的discord伺服器，提供意見和錯誤回報，獲得更多關於此遊戲的資訊和未來新專案的最新消息！
